channel.title: [PI] Few Problems
channel.description:
One of my problems is that my Turmoil won't drain. I've check every file that I know of that would hold anything that has to do with prayer and turmoil. If anyone can help me out I'd appreciate it.
Another problem of mine is my mining xp is very slow. I've changed it in the files to make it worth more xp per ore but again nothing changed. Any ideas?
Thanks.
